# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="47c05-102">Outlook.com でメールと予定表を印刷する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="47c05-103">メール メッセージを印刷するには、次の手順を実行します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="47c05-104">印刷するメッセージを選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="47c05-105">メッセージの右上隅で、3 つのドットを</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="47c05-106">選択して</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="47c05-107">[**印刷**] を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="47c05-108">予定表を印刷するには、次の手順を実行します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="47c05-109">ページの右上隅で、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="47c05-110">[**印刷**] を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="47c05-111">表示と時間の範囲を選択して、[**印刷**] を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="47c05-112">操作方法の詳細については、[Outlook.com でのメールと予定表の印刷](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)に関するページを参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47c05-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
